entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 12:42 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
